content.description: A bouldery start into the off-width gains the wide almost horizontal crack.  Continue up obvious cracks to the summit.  Descend by scrambling down a 4th class gully to the climbers right.
content.protection: #4 BD or two needed to protect bouldery start.
content.location: Left end of Clump Canyon.  Route is visible from parking for sites 63-65.

content.description:
Climb Kinda Sorta partway, then move left into a thin right-facing flake which is followed to it's end before moving back right to join Kinda Sorta.

A fun variation worth doing if the rope is hanging there.
content.location: Center of the face; starts on Kinda Sorta.

content.description: Climb up and right along a ramp, but cut left well before the end of the ramp and follow a crack system up and left to the top.  This is a very insecure crack and face climb.  The protection is fairly good, but difficult to place.
content.location: This starts just right of It's About Time.

content.description: This starts about twenty feet right of "Finally" and climbs up left-slanting cracks to the hole on "At Last". Finish by that route.
Start on It's about Time, but stay in the lower crack which cuts sharply left to join Finally just below where that route jogs right.
content.protection: TR, but could probably be led
content.location: Located between At Last and It's about Time.

content.description: At the rear right of site #59 and near a boulder is right facing corner. Follow this, double cracks and crap to the top.

A quick 5.7 move up to the ledge gains you access to a short finger crack that eventually leans right at a lower angle summit.  There is a scrubby little bush in the lower section of the finger crack.
content.location: Back left end of Clump Canyon (Indian Cove sites 63-65).  Route is visible from the parking spots.

content.description: first couple of moves pretty easy to an interesting crux that is really enjoyable involving some pumpy moves and a balancy rock over to easier climbing again. The notch at the top is a little cruxy as well... One star out of five...shade in the afternoon
content.protection: standard thin, small to medium rack of cams/nuts...
